description: This file defines a React functional component named NoteList, which renders a scrollable list of note items with optional empty state view. It is part of a front-end notes management application, allowing interaction such as editing, deleting, pinning, and unarchiving notes.

methods.name: NoteList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete, onTogglePin, onUnarchive }, scrollRef)
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of notes or an empty state if no notes are provided.

ctags.name: NoteList
ctags.pattern: /^const NoteList = forwardRef(function NoteList({ notes, onEdit, onDelete, onTogglePin, onUnarchiv/
